snippet: Journalists for the French newspaper Le Monde reported in May that they had witnessed repeated chemical attacks on Syrian rebel forces in the Damascus suburbs.
abstract: Journalists for the French newspaper Le Monde reported in May that they had witnessed repeated chemical attacks on Syrian rebel forces in the Damascus suburbs.

headline.main: French Journalists Previously Reported Chemical Attacks in Damascus Suburbs
